Package org.jcatapult.mvc.result.message.jsp

Class Summary
ActionMessagesTag This class is a JSP taglib that can retrieve action messages from the MessageStore and output them using a FreeMarker template.
FieldMessagesTag This class is a JSP taglib that can retrieve field messages from the MessageStore and output them using a FreeMarker template.
MessageFunction This class is a JSP function that can retrieve messages from the MessageProvider and output them.
MessageTag This class is a JSP taglib that can retrieve messages from the MessageProvider and output them.
